pageTitle: Responding to rumours - Tonio Liuzzi's exclusive column | Force India | F1 features | ESPN.co.uk
textBeforeTable: Singapore Grand Prix 2010 ad_counter++; document.write(' var omniStoryId = "29642"; var omniAuthId = "ESPN Staff"; var omniSiteSection1 = "Force India site"; var omniCt = "story"; var omniPageName = "features:Responding to rumours"; Looking at the top five drivers in the championship, we are set for a great battle over the next two months. If I had to put my money on one of them I would say Mark Webber, because - although Ferrari should be strong at Suzuka - I think Red Bull have still got an advantage in the car overall and Webber is not making mistakes at the moment, he's optimising everything. Of course I don't know what the teams have planned in terms of updates, but if I had to
